description: Now a culinary landmark in the province, this restaurant is run by two enthusiastic sisters who serve cuisine with its roots in local traditions and prepared using seasonal ingredients. Renovation work over the past few years has added to the style and character of the restaurant, which boasts a small garden for summer dining plus a good selection of wines.
